page.title: 06THE CLOVA HOTEL.
page.content: The hotel is a stone building with a slate roof. There are 7 bedrooms altogether, four of which have black and white televisions. There is also 1 lounge bar, 1 dining room, 1 sitting room with colour T.V. and 1 kitchen containing 1 aga cooker, 2 microwave ovens and 1 calor gas cooker. Most guests stay for only 2 or 3 days but a few book to stay for 1 or 2 weeks. The cost for bed and breakfast is Â£16. This includes V.A.T. while the cost for a week is (Â£16 x7)-10% and for 2 weeks (Â£16x14)-2o%. The biggest trade is not in the letting of bedrooms but in the sale of food and drinks and in the sale of fishing permits.The latter cost Â£7-Â£10 per day or Â£3o-Â£45 per week. The A.A. has rated the hotel as 2*.
